WFSgoto Demo

JavaScript plugin

A simple plugin for animated transition between page blocks.
The functionality for the “go to top” button has also been implemented.

Plugin benefits:

  • Plugin weight - javascript/css - 3,4 KB
  • Plugin launch prompts in console.log()
